text: (upbeat music)
- We tried to save all of the,
like complicated,

the deployment and
everything from the customer.

So to publish a site,
or to publish your app
is just one click of a button.
And we were looking in AWS Solution

that would reduce the
complexity to the minimum.

What we built is a container
that we open sourced
and we give to our customer.
And it's been deployed on App Runner.

The component that we are
deploying in App Runner,
is translating two different worlds.
So one of them is develop world,
and the other one is the every database
that we choose to deploy.
Sights needs to be more dynamic
to allow the site to be more dynamic
and retrieve data from many sources.
So WIX Avelo is our own private cloud.
We were looking for something simple,
and we were looking for something

that can also be complicated
as the customer wishes,
but also very easy to manage.
App Runner was the only option

that kind of mixed all of our
weird requirements together,
and everything really fit it perfectly.
(bright upbeat music)
